org.apache.spark.sql.sources.v2

Interface ContinuousReadSupport

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataSourceV2

    @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public interface ContinuousReadSupport
extends DataSourceV2
    A mix-in interface for DataSourceV2. Data sources can implement this interface to provide data reading ability for continuous stream processing.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ContinuousReader createContinuousReader(java.util.Optional<StructType> schema, String checkpointLocation, DataSourceOptions options)
      Creates a ContinuousReader to scan the data from this data source.

    • Method Detail

      • createContinuousReader

        ContinuousReader createContinuousReader(java.util.Optional<StructType> schema,
                                        String checkpointLocation,
                                        DataSourceOptions options)
        Creates a ContinuousReader to scan the data from this data source.
        Parameters:
        schema - the user provided schema, or empty() if none was provided
        checkpointLocation - a path to Hadoop FS scratch space that can be used for failure recovery. Readers for the same logical source in the same query will be given the same checkpointLocation.
        options - the options for the returned data source reader, which is an immutable case-insensitive string-to-string map.
